title: Steve Birthday Party, Football Talk, Erykah Badu, Comedy Roulette, NFL Honors, Presidential Race 2020, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Steve Birthday Party, Football Talk, Erykah Badu, Comedy Roulette, NFL Honors, Presidential Race 2020, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
We are back from the weekend and boy does the crew have something to say about the teams going to the Superbowl.  Steve talks about the details of his birthday party.  Erykah Badu gets heat for suggesting that people pray for R. Kelly.  Comedy Roulette covers the things that you would say to your boss after winning the lottery.  Big Dog will be hosting the NFL Honors on February 2.  CA senator Kamala Harris announced that she will be running for President in 2020.  Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO mentions faith and execution plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
